body_html: It seems the problem was that I defined several losses within the loop body of a while loop and added them to tf.GraphKeys.LOSSES collection. I did not realize at that point that tf.add_to_collection is not a dynamic graph operation. It is not even a graph operation after all.
body_text: It seems the problem was that I defined several losses within the loop body of a while loop and added them to tf.GraphKeys.LOSSES collection. I did not realize at that point that tf.add_to_collection is not a dynamic graph operation. It is not even a graph operation after all.
body: It seems the problem was that I defined several losses within the loop body of a while loop and added them to `tf.GraphKeys.LOSSES` collection. I did not realize at that point that `tf.add_to_collection` is not a dynamic graph operation. It is not even a graph operation after all.
